column2: "Bravo, that is a wonderful outcome. You completed this special training without any problems."
"You may not feel the progress that you've made, but to others around you, the changes are as clear as day."
"The precision of every one of your movements is in a league all its own. And that could have only been attained through time and effort."
"Now I'll have to come up with a follow-up training program worthy of your skills. Until then..."
